languages.text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Аристократ назначает одного из союзников своим слугой до конца боя.
Когда на слугу воздействуют {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} аристократа, слуга получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} аристократа.
Атакуя цель, которая получила {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от аристократа в его прошлый ход, слуга получает +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} по этой цели.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.\nAny time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all characteristics until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt damage to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against that target.
Can only be used once per combat.

The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all characteristics until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt damage to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against that target.
Can only be used once per combat.

The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all characteristics until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt damage to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against that target.
Can only be used once per combat.

The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Der Adlige wählt einen Verbündeten, der bis zum Ende des Kampfes sein Diener wird.
Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Adligen auf den Diener angewendet werden, erhält der Diener bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Adligen +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
Immer wenn der Diener ein Ziel angreift, dem der Adlige im letzten Zug {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, erhält der Diener +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen dieses Ziel.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der Adlige wählt einen Verbündeten, der bis zum Ende des Kampfes sein Diener wird.\nImmer wenn die Fähigkeiten des Adligen auf den Diener angewendet werden, erhält der Diener bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Adligen +5 auf alle Eigenschaften.
Immer wenn der Diener ein Ziel angreift, dem der Adlige im letzten Zug Schaden zugefügt hat, erhält der Diener +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% kritische Trefferchance gegen dieses Ziel.
Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

Der Adlige wählt einen Verbündeten, der bis zum Ende des Kampfes sein Diener wird. Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Adligen auf den Diener angewendet werden, erhält der Diener bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Adligen +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Immer wenn der Diener ein Ziel angreift, dem der Adlige im letzten Zug {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, erhält der Diener +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen dieses Ziel. Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Le noble désigne un allié qui devient son serviteur jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Chaque fois que les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du noble s'appliquent au serviteur, ce dernier reçoit un bonus de +5 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du noble.
Chaque fois que le serviteur attaque une cible à laquelle le noble a infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} lors du tour précédent, il bénéficie de +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} contre cette cible.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Le noble désigne un allié qui devient son serviteur jusqu'à la fin du combat.\nChaque fois que les capacités du noble s'appliquent au serviteur, celui-ci reçoit un bonus de +5 sur toutes ses caractéristiques jusqu'au début du tour suivant du noble.
Chaque fois que le serviteur attaque une cible à laquelle le noble a infligé des dégâts lors du tour précédent, il bénéficie de +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de chances d'infliger un coup critique à cette cible.
Utilisable une fois par combat.

Le noble désigne un allié qui devient son serviteur jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Chaque fois que les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du noble s'appliquent au serviteur, ce dernier reçoit un bonus de +5 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du noble.
Chaque fois que le serviteur attaque une cible à laquelle le noble a infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} lors du tour précédent, il bénéficie de +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} contre cette cible.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text:
贵族指派其中一名盟友成为仆佣，效果持续至战斗结束。
当贵族的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响到仆佣时，该名仆佣的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高5点，效果持续至贵族的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。
当仆佣攻击上个回合受到贵族{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的目标时，仆佣对该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%。
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
贵族指派其中一名盟友成为仆佣，效果持续至战斗结束。\n当贵族的能力影响到仆佣时，该名仆佣的所有属性都会提高5点，直到贵族的下个回合开始为止。
当仆佣攻击上个回合受到贵族伤害的目标时，仆佣对该目标的暴击率提高{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%。
此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。

贵族指派其中一名盟友成为仆佣，效果持续至战斗结束。\n当贵族的能力影响到仆佣时，该名仆佣的所有属性都会提高5点，直到贵族的下个回合开始为止。
当仆佣攻击上个回合受到贵族伤害的目标时，仆佣对该目标的暴击率提高{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%。
此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
El noble elige a un aliado como sirviente hasta el final del combate.
Siempre que las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del noble afectan al sirviente, el sirviente gana +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del noble.
Cuando el sirviente ataca a un objetivo al que el noble ha infligido {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en el último turno, el sirviente gana +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} contra ese objetivo.
! Solo funciona una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
El noble elige a un aliado como sirviente hasta el final del combate.\nSiempre que las capacidades del noble afectan al sirviente, el sirviente gana +5 a todas las capacidades hasta el principio del siguiente turno del noble.
Cuando el sirviente ataca a un objetivo al que el noble ha infligido daño en el último turno, el sirviente gana +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de probabilidad de impacto crítico contra ese objetivo.
Solo funciona una vez por combate.

El noble elige a un aliado como sirviente hasta el final del combate.
Siempre que las capacidades del noble afectan al sirviente, el sirviente gana +5 a todas las capacidades hasta el principio del siguiente turno del noble.
Cuando el sirviente ataca a un objetivo al que el noble ha infligido daño en el último turno, el sirviente gana +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} % de probabilidad de impacto crítico contra ese objetivo.
Solo funciona una vez por combate.

languages.text:
貴族は、戦闘終了まで、自分の従者となる味方を1人指定する。
貴族の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が従者に効果を与えるときは、貴族の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで従者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5される。
前のターンに貴族が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えたターゲットに従者が攻撃する時、従者はそのターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%される
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
貴族は、戦闘終了まで、自分の従者となる味方を1人指定する。\n貴族のアビリティが従者に効果を与えるときは、貴族の次のターン開始まで従者はすべての能力が+5される。
前のターンに貴族がダメージを与えたターゲットに従者が攻撃する時、従者はそのターゲットに対してクリティカルヒット率が+{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%される。
1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

貴族は、戦闘終了まで、自分の従者となる味方を1人指定する。
貴族のアビリティが従者に効果を与えるときは、貴族の次のターン開始まで従者はすべての能力が+5される。
前のターンに貴族がダメージを与えたターゲットに従者が攻撃する時、従者はそのターゲットに対してクリティカルヒット率が+{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}%される。
1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

traits.locale_text:
Аристократ назначает одного из союзников своим слугой до конца боя.\nКогда на слугу воздействуют способности аристократа, слуга получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до начала следующего хода аристократа.
Атакуя цель, которая получила урон от аристократа в его прошлый ход, слуга получает +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% к шансу критического попадания по этой цели.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Когда на слугу воздействуют способности аристократа, слуга получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до начала следующего хода аристократа.
Атакуя цель, которая получила урон от аристократа в его прошлый ход, слуга получает +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% к шансу критического попадания по этой цели.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Аристократ назначает одного из союзников своим слугой до конца боя.
Когда на слугу воздействуют способности аристократа, слуга получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до начала следующего хода аристократа.
Атакуя цель, которая получила урон от аристократа в его прошлый ход, слуга получает +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% к шансу критического попадания по этой цели.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
Soylu, dost birimlerden birini çatışma sonuna dek hizmetkârı olarak atar.
Soylunun {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g}, hizmetkâra her etki ettiğinde hizmetkârın tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} +5 puan artar. Bu etki, soylunun bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başına dek sürer.
Hizmetkâr, soylunun son turda {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiği bir hedefe saldırdığında o hedefe karşı +%{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} olasılığı kazanır.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
The noble assigns one ally who will become their servant until the end of combat.
Any time the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect the servant, the servant gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the start of the noble's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Any time the servant attacks a target that the noble dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to last turn, the servant gains +{uip|CriticalChance|b826d0a5600e44f7b6272750584bfca0}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against that target.
! Can only be used once per combat.
